content.text:
# Abzakovo, Beloretsky District, Republic of Bashkortostan

}}
Abzakovo (; , Ab≈∫aq) is a rural locality (a selo) and the administrative center of Abzakovsky Selsoviet, Beloretsky District of the Republic of Bashkortostan, Russia.
A ski resort of the same name is located in the vicinity.

External links
*[http://www.abzakovo.com Official website of the Abzakovo ski resort]
